Name: Landmarks, 395 Flatbush Avenue Ext. Redevelopment, Brooklyn (C 260042 PCK).
Title: Application number C 260042 PCK (395 Flatbush Avenue Ext. Redevelopment) submitted by the Department of Citywide Administrative Services and the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for a site selection and acquisition of property for use as a medical clinic, office space, community facility space and laboratories located at 395 Flatbush Avenue (Block 2093, Lot 1), Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 2, Council District 35.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
